h1. Manage Categories Test Case
h2. Steps to Manage Categories
h3. Required Test Cases (in order)
h3. Main steps

* Goto *Content Management* -> *File Explorer*
* Select a drive to work: In case, Select drive *Collaboration Center*
* then, Select View is Admin
* Create two folders in root: Test
* In folder Test: Add a document is BBB
* Select document BBB and click *Manage Categories* icon
* In Select Category tab: select a node which available in tree node
* In Referenced categories tab: show path of node which referenced to document
* Result: Goto node which referenced to document: you will see document BBB in this node

!ManageCategories.jpg!

h3. Other checks

* *Case 1*: Test add category for document
** *In put*: Select a document in tree and perform add category for document to a node in system workspace
** *Output*:
*** Node's path where referenced document showed in Add category popup
*** Document is listed in node which referenced document
* *Case 2*: Test add category for node uploaded
** *Input*: Select a node uploaded which available and perform add category for node uploaded to a node in system workspace
** *Output*:
*** Node's path where referenced node upload showed in Add category popup
*** uploaded node is listed in node which referenced node upload
* *Case 3*: Test add category for node imported
** *Input*: Select a node imported which available and perform add category for node imported to a node in system workspace
** *Output*:
*** Node's path where referenced node imported showed in Add category popup
*** imported node is listed in node which referenced node upload
* *Case 4*: Test add category for node is nt:unstructured
** *Input*:
*** Select a node is nt:unstructured
*** Click on 'Manage Categories' icon
** *Output*: Show message "This function supported only for document type"
* *Case 5*: Test add category for node is nt:folder
** *Input*
*** Select a node is nt:folder
*** Click on 'Manage Categories' icon
** *Output*: Show message "This function supported only for document type"
* Case 6: Add some categories for document, uploaded file, imported file
** Input:
*** Select node is document or uploaded file or imported file
*** Add some categories for nodes
** Output: All referenced categories are listed in  'Referenced Categories' tab
